name: Batteryman Power Surge
text: Target 1 "Batteryman" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, and if you do, both players take 1000 damage. You can banish this card from your GY and target 1 "Batteryman" monster you control (Quick Effect); that monster is unaffected by your opponent's card effects until the end of this turn. You can only activate 1 "Batteryman Power Surge" per turn.
